Header: Sri Lanka to launch first Satellite
Content: Minister PataliChampikaRanawaka says measures will be taken to launch the first Satellite built in the country this year. He said this while attending a program organized by the Ministry of Megapolis and Western Development. The program was held in Battaramulla under the patronage of Minister PataliChampikaRanawaka. Attention was paid on the future course of action implemented by the Urban Development Authority under the Ministry of Megapolis and Western Development. A book compiled in connection with the event was launched on the occasion. Minister PataliChampikaRanawaka said that the NANO technology park has been built at Homagama to make available graphite and titanium products to the country. The Bio technology is to provide new value to spices. He further said that a Space Center would be set up at Homagama to get all the information. He added that such a Center will be able to forecast weather conditions early.
